#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define GI ({int t;scanf("%d",&t);t;})

int M(int a)
{
	int ans = __builtin_popcount(a)-1;

	while(a>1)
		a/=2,ans++;

	return ans;
}
int main()
{
	int t;
	t=GI;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n = GI;
		
		int highsetbit = 0;
		for(int j=0;j<=30;j++)
		{
			if(n&(1<<j))
				highsetbit=j;
		}
		int ans = 100;

		for(int j=0;j<=highsetbit;j++)
		{
			if(n&(1<<j))
			{
				int A = n & ((1<<j)-1);
				int B = n - A;
				ans = min(ans,max(M(A),M(B)));
			}
		}
		if(!(n&(n-1)))
		{
			n/=2;
			ans=M(n);
		}
		cout<<ans<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
